id.fieldDescription: HTML ID attribute to apply to the component.
id.name: ./id

style.fieldDescription: Select the template of the mega drop down
style.name: ./mmTemplate

template5.text: External Link with Large Promo Image

primaryNavTitle.fieldDescription: The Primary Navigation title to be specified.
primaryNavTitle.name: ./primaryNavTitle

primaryNavAriaLabel.fieldDescription: The aria label for the primary navigation title is specified.
primaryNavAriaLabel.name: ./primaryNavAriaLabel

tabName.fieldDescription: The Primary Navigation tab name to be specified.
tabName.name: ./tabName

ctalist.fieldDescription: CTA links that gets displayed on left pane

text.fieldDescription: The text to be rendered on the CTA
text.name: ./leftPaneCtaText

link.fieldDescription: Link to a content page, external URL or page anchor.
link.name: ./leftPaneCtaLink

ariaLabel.fieldDescription: Leave blank for automated aria label ({header}:{CTA text}).
ariaLabel.name: ./leftPaneCtaAriaLabel

target.fieldDescription: Target for the link authored - current tab or same tab
target.name: ./leftPaneCtaTarget

headerCopy.fieldDescription: The Header copy to be displayed.
headerCopy.name: ./leftPaneHeaderCopy

bodyCopy.fieldDescription: The Body copy to be displayed.
bodyCopy.name: ./leftPaneBodyCopy

ctalist.fieldDescription: CTA links that gets displayed on left pane

text.fieldDescription: The text to be rendered on the CTA
text.name: ./leftPaneCopyCtaText

link.fieldDescription: Link to a content page, external URL or page anchor.
link.name: ./leftPaneCopyCtaLink

linkType.fieldDescription: Link Type for the link authored - to make a link as Primary or Secondary
linkType.name: ./leftPaneCopyCtaLinkType

icon.fieldDescription: Select an icon to be rendered before the text on the CTA
icon.name: ./leftPaneCopyCtaIcon

ariaLabel.fieldDescription: Leave blank for automated aria label ({header}:{CTA text}).
ariaLabel.name: ./leftPaneCopyCtaAriaLabel

target.fieldDescription: Target for the link authored - current tab or same tab
target.name: ./leftPaneCopyCtaTarget

imagePath.fieldDescription: Select an Image to be displayed
imagePath.name: ./rightPaneImage

decorative.fieldDescription: Check if the image should be ignored by assistive technology and therefore does not require an alternative text. This applies to decorative images only.
decorative.name: ./isImageDecorative

imageAlt.fieldDescription: Textual alternative of the meaning or function of the image, for visually impaired readers.
imageAlt.name: ./rightPaneImageAlt

imageLink.fieldDescription: Link to a content page, external URL or page anchor.
imageLink.name: ./rightPaneImageLink

imagetarget.fieldDescription: Target for the link authored - current tab or same tab
imagetarget.name: ./rightPaneImageTarget

imagePath.fieldDescription: Select an Image to be displayed
imagePath.name: ./rightPaneImage

decorative.fieldDescription: Check if the image should be ignored by assistive technology and therefore does not require an alternative text. This applies to decorative images only.
decorative.name: ./isImageTextDecorative

imageAlt.fieldDescription: Textual alternative of the meaning or function of the image, for visually impaired readers.
imageAlt.name: ./rightPaneImageTextAlt

headerCopy.fieldDescription: The Header copy to be displayed.
headerCopy.name: ./rightPaneHeaderCopy

bodyCopy.fieldDescription: The Body copy to be displayed.
bodyCopy.name: ./rightPaneBodyCopy

text.fieldDescription: The text to be rendered on the CTA
text.name: ./rightPaneCopyCtaText

link.fieldDescription: Link to a content page, external URL or page anchor.
link.name: ./rightPaneCopyCtaLink

icon.fieldDescription: Select an icon to be rendered before the text on the CTA
icon.name: ./rightPaneCopyCtaIcon

linkType.fieldDescription: Link Type for the link authored - to make a link as Primary or Secondary
linkType.name: ./rightPaneCopyCtaLinkType

ariaLabel.fieldDescription: Leave blank for automated aria label ({header}:{CTA text}).
ariaLabel.name: ./rightPaneCopyCtaAriaLabel

target.fieldDescription: Target for the link authored - current tab or same tab
target.name: ./rightPaneCopyCtaTarget

text.name: ./quickLinksCtaText
